title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Up for auction is a rare Genesis Coin Series 2 full 7-coin set!!This is set #38 and has all 7 coin:Shiny Gold, Shiny Silver, Shiny Copper, Antique Gold, Antique Silver, Antique Copper, Antique BrassHere is link to original thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1489364The distribution for the coins were blind boxes that came 5 coins to a boxThis done in the style of sports cards and was meant to encourage trading amongst collectors to see if a complete set could be made There were a total of 100 sets of coins40 of the sets were 7-coin sets10 of the sets were 6-coin sets10 of the sets were 4-coin sets40 of the sets were 3-coin setsSTARTING BID: 0.0050BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0003BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 18th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Markzellers - 0.005 BTCFigured I would throw out the opening bid, these look really cool!

comments.author: minerjones
